verses.name: Proverbs 14:24
verses.text: The crown of the wise is their riches: but the foolishness of fools is folly.

verses.name: Proverbs 14:25
verses.text: A true witness delivereth souls: but a deceitful witness speaketh lies.

verses.name: Proverbs 14:26
verses.text: In the fear of the Lord is strong confidence: and his children shall have a place of refuge.

verses.name: Proverbs 14:27
verses.text: The fear of the Lord is a fountain of life, to depart from the snares of death.

verses.name: Proverbs 14:28
verses.text: In the multitude of people is the king’s honour: but in the want of people is the destruction of the prince.
